summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the submission to the qualified electors (voters) of The City of Seattle at a special election requested to be held therein on November 5, 1974 of the initiative measure contemplated by voter's petition (C.F. 279284) relating to use of 1968 Forward Thrust Bond moneys for the Woodland Park Zoo and restricting and defining the purposes for the use of such funds and defining the area and extent of park and highway and street use to be devoted thereto; providing for certification of such initiative measure to the Director of the Department of Records and Elections of King County and prescribing the ballot title therefor.
